title: Share your location with ICE?
description:
Private companies have long used your phone’s location data for advertising. Now we know the federal government is using it to enforce the border.

Featuring
@ByronTau
@shiringhaffary

Links to resources discussed:
Federal Agencies Use Cellphone Location Data for Immigration Enforcement

The “smarter” wall: How drones, sensors, and AI are patrolling the border

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.

Follow Us:
Newsletter: Recode Daily 
Twitter: @Recode
